mapper.select: select * from edu_book_goods where books_author like '%${searchkey}%' or books_name like '% ${searchkey}%'
select s.school_name from edu_book_goods r LEFT JOIN edu_school s on s.school_id=r.school_id where r.school_id=#{school_id}
